page_title: Aericki Ferreira - Systems Analyst and Developer | Portfolio

about.title: About Me
about.description: Full-stack developer and founder of Best Breakers — an electronic judging system for breaking battles used in official championships across São Paulo and Mato Grosso, Brazil. I design, architect, and develop end-to-end solutions: from Go and Node.js backends to React + TypeScript frontends, including real-time WebSocket voting and championship management. Graduated in Systems Analysis and Development, I constantly seek to bridge technology and real impact in sport.

experience.title: Experience
experience.bestbreakers_founder_description: Creator and lead developer of the electronic judging system for breaking battles. Platform used in 10 championships, with 196 registered athletes, across 2 states (SP and MT) and 6 crews. Judges vote via tablet with real-time results through WebSocket, complete championship management, automatic bracketing, round configurations, and special rounds for the breaking sports scene.
experience.web_developer_description: Development of full-stack web applications, from RESTful APIs with Node.js, Express, and Go to reactive interfaces with React and TypeScript. Projects include ranking platforms, client landing pages, and tools for the breaking community.
experience.computer_technician_description: Diagnosis, repair, and assembly of computers, as well as technical support for users. This experience enhanced my problem-solving and customer service skills.
experience.systems_analysis_degree_title: Degree in Systems Analysis and Development
experience.systems_analysis_degree_description: Degree focused on the entire software development lifecycle, including agile methodologies, software architecture, and database design. I learned to develop robust and scalable solutions, applying the best market practices.

skills.title: Technical Skills
skills.description: These are the technologies I use to build my applications. I have a versatile profile, with knowledge in both frontend and backend, which allows me to have a complete view of a project's development.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Real projects in production that demonstrate my ability to ideate, design, and deliver complete solutions — from concept to implementation.
projects.bestbreakers_system_description: Complete electronic judging platform for breaking battles. Judges vote via tablet with real-time results through WebSocket. Championship management, automatic bracketing, round configurations, and special rounds for the breaking sports scene. Used in 10 championships, 196 registered athletes, 2 states (SP and MT), 6 crews.
projects.bestbreakers_ranking_description: Web platform for publishing official breaking rankings by state and event, with multi-language support (PT, EN, ES). Rankings by category (B-Boy, B-Girl, Youth, Kids, Senior, 3vs3) with scoring system and event multipliers.
projects.estela_logistics_description: Professional landing page developed for a logistics company. Modern and responsive design focused on conversion and presentation of company services.
projects.breaking_locations_description: Web platform that connects breaking dancers to training spots. Includes interactive map, location registration, and rating system.

certifications.title: Certifications
certifications.nextjs_description: Comprehensive course on Next.js, covering fundamentals and advanced web development techniques.
certifications.web_dev_title: Complete Web Development: 20 Courses and 20 Projects
certifications.web_dev_description: Complete training in web development, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, and more, with practical projects.
certifications.algorithms_description: Course focused on programming logic and problem-solving with algorithms.
